last_episode_to_air.name: Paddington Has to Say Goodbye
last_episode_to_air.overview: The time has come for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still time for one last adventure - or is there?

name: The Adventures of Paddington
overview: Journey to London for heart-warming adventures with beloved British bear Paddington in this CG-animated series, which centres on a younger Paddington as he writes letters to Aunt Lucy celebrating the new things he has discovered through the day’s exciting activities.

episodes.name: Paddington Finds a Pigeon
episodes.overview: Paddington nurses an injured bird back to health and discovers a new friend in Pigeonton.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Chores List
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown creates a list of chores for Paddington, who accidentally picks up the wrong list.

episodes.name: Paddington Finds a Hobby
episodes.overview: Paddington doesn't have a hobby, so Mrs. Brown helps him find out what he's good at.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Stamp
episodes.overview: Paddington gets his arm stuck in a mailbox while sending a letter to Aunt Lucy.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Magic Trick
episodes.overview: Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice.

episodes.name: Paddington and Poor Mr. Curry
episodes.overview: Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

episodes.name: Paddington Makes Pancakes
episodes.overview: Paddington tries to save Pancake Day in the Browns' house when Mrs. Bird becomes injured.

episodes.name: Paddington Plays Football
episodes.overview: Jonathan teaches Paddington football, but Paddington kicks the ball into Mr. Curry's garden.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Treehouse
episodes.overview: The children want to camp out for the night in the treehouse. Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep as the kids will be scared. Paddington wants to prove him wrong, but a lightning storm means they have to come in doors.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Monster Hunt
episodes.overview: There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes Paddington on a monster hunt.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Painting
episodes.overview: Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next artwork, so Paddington decides to help find her mojo.

episodes.name: Paddington Finds Buried Treasure
episodes.overview: Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Wardrobe
episodes.overview: Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered.

episodes.name: Paddington Learns the Violin
episodes.overview: Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

episodes.name: Paddington Helps with Homework
episodes.overview: Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

episodes.name: Paddington Makes a Scrapbook
episodes.overview: Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy.

episodes.name: Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru
episodes.overview: Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

episodes.name: Paddington Plans a Party
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown has forgotten to get Mrs. Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Meteor Shower
episodes.overview: Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Talent Show
episodes.overview: Paddington enters Mr. Brown into the Townhall talent contest. However, Mr. Brown gets stage fright and Paddington must come to the rescue.

episodes.name: Paddington Meets Lucky
episodes.overview: Paddington meets Mateo’s’ dog “Lucky” he tries to teach him tricks but Lucky will not behave.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Love Day Cards
episodes.overview: It’s Loveday in Windsor gardens, Mr. Brown has forgotten to book a table for Mrs. Brown at the Café and Paddington is on a mission to deliver loveday cards to all his friends.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Lost Gerbil
episodes.overview: Judy is looking after the School pet Gerbil which is accidentally released by Paddington. Paddington and Judy search the house and Mr. Curry’s garden looking for it.

episodes.name: Paddington Earns a Ranger Badge
episodes.overview: Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy about having them in house.

episodes.name: Paddington Flies a Kite
episodes.overview: It’s a perfect Windy day and Jonathan wishes to play Kite with his dad. Mr. Brown is stuck at home doing business, so Paddington takes Jonathan to the park to play Kites.

episodes.name: Paddington the Detective
episodes.overview: DAN Drainpipe Dan is on the loose stealing Mrs. Brown’s wedding ring. Inspector Paddington of the yard is on his trail.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Fingertrap
episodes.overview: Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese finger trap, Paddington gets attached to Mr. Curry and they are stuck together whilst auditioning for the Windsor gardens play.

episodes.name: Paddington Rides a Scooter
episodes.overview: Paddington, Jonathan & Judy are playing imaginary games in the park. Judy goes to the half pipe with Mateo, but they decide they might have more fun playing with Paddington and Jonathan instead.

episodes.name: Paddington's First Chinese New Year
episodes.overview: Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party with dancing Dragons, Chinese food and special fireworks.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Missing Tickets
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them but actually find out how thoughtful & caring Mr. Brown really is.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Summer Games
episodes.overview: The Browns are having their annual Summer games will Paddington be good at any of them? Or will competitive dad Mr. Brown ruin it for the children again?

episodes.name: Paddington Goes Camping
episodes.overview: Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday but they get no further than the park and then get locked in!

episodes.name: Paddington and the Bone
episodes.overview: Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton to do a talk at the town hall but Lucky the dog has stolen a priceless bone and buried it somewhere in Windsor gardens, Paddington goes on a hunt to find it.

episodes.name: Paddington Joins a Band
episodes.overview: The Kids decide to form a Rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play and what is Rock music? It’s too loud to practice in the house so where can they play? Will they break up before the grand performance in the Park?

episodes.name: Paddington and the Fundraising Day
episodes.overview: The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money, Will Mr. Brown really shave off all his hair for charity?

episodes.name: Paddington's Alien Adventure
episodes.overview: Are aliens out there? Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world? Paddington forms a greeting committee to welcome them to earth!

episodes.name: Paddington and the Fire Engine
episodes.overview: Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade and when there is a real emergency, it's Paddington to the rescue to save a cat stuck up a tree in the park.

episodes.name: Paddington Joins a Club
episodes.overview: When Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse, they won't let Jonathan and Paddington join without a password.

episodes.name: Paddington Builds a Scarecrow
episodes.overview: Paddington accidentally ruins Mr Brown's lovely lawn and must repair it, but the birds take a liking to the seeds, so he builds a scarecrow.

episodes.name: Paddington Plays Hide & Seek
episodes.overview: Paddington, Jonathan, and Judy try to find champion hide-and-seeker, Mrs Bird.

episodes.name: Paddington and the House Guest
episodes.overview: Mr Curry is invited by Paddington to stay with the Browns while his flooded house is being repaired, and he thinks that the Browns are too disorganised.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Banana
episodes.overview: Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the cafe without paying for it and must return it before Sophia notices and calls PC Wells, but Mrs. Bird turns it into a cake! What will he do?

episodes.name: Paddington Chooses a Best Friend
episodes.overview: Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia’s café, but who is Paddington’s BEST FRIEND is it Jonathan, or Judy or Mateo or Mr. Gruber? It’s time to find out…how will he choose a best friend?

episodes.name: Paddington and the Lamppost
episodes.overview: Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber’s shop but the council have condemned it! Where will Pigeonton live now? Paddington decides to find him a new home!

episodes.name: Paddington and Halloween
episodes.overview: It’s Halloween and Paddington goes Treat or Treating with Jonathan and Judy around Windsor gardens but Mr. Curry does not want to join in…or does he? And Why is Mrs. Bird not scared at all?

episodes.name: Paddington Has an Autumn Wish
episodes.overview: Why do the tress lose their leaves? It does not happen in Peru. Paddington discovers Autumn/Fall and a winter festival.

episodes.name: Paddington Runs the Cafe
episodes.overview: Paddington plays a game with Jonathan and Judy in the park, but Matteo can't because he is looking after the café, so Paddington says he will watch the café so Matteo can play.

episodes.name: Paddington Makes a Film
episodes.overview: Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima. What will he film?

episodes.name: Paddington's First Snow
episodes.overview: It’s snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. Will the brave Polar explores Jonathan, Judy and Paddington return? There are large snowy footprints in the park is it the Yeti? And who is wearing that awful jumper?

episodes.name: Paddington and the Metal Detector
episodes.overview: Paddington is given a metal detector by Mr. Gruber, and thinks he has found something, wondering if it is lost pirate treasure or just another rusty bottle cap.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Lost Letter
episodes.overview: Paddington has accidentally sent Jonathan’s Santa letter to Peru by mistake. He tries to find out what Jonathan’s wish list is. He sends Pigeont on to The North Pole with a new list but now he’s missing. A storm causes a power cut in Windsor gardens which means Christmas will be ruined for everyone. Mr. Curry ever the Eagle Ranger is always prepared so comes to the rescue and its turkey for all at the town hall. But what was Jonathan’s Christmas wish?

episodes.name: Paddington Meets a Police Officer
episodes.overview: Paddington decides to protect his town as an unofficial policeman after a neighborhood watch meeting, and one day, he discovers someone has been littering.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Balloons
episodes.overview: Jonathan is upset when he loses his balloon, so Paddington decides to find another one for him, but he ends up stuck in the air, flying across London.

episodes.name: Paddington's Plant Problem
episodes.overview: Mr. Curry goes on holiday & gives Paddington the job of watering one plant, it looks almost dead, can he revive Ellie before Mr. Curry returns?

episodes.name: Paddington the Artist
episodes.overview: Paddington wants to take part in the CommunArty show, but what’s he good at? Pottery, Painting or sculpture?

episodes.name: Paddington's Squirrel Surprise
episodes.overview: Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel’s nut store so invites him in to apologize, however he didn’t expect him to bring friends.

episodes.name: Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent
episodes.overview: Judy gets a Toy Spy Kit, but why is Mrs. Bird being so secretive? There’s only one way to find out let’s follow her!

episodes.name: Paddington Clowns Around
episodes.overview: Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don’t go to plan, will Mrs. Brown’s clown act save the day?

episodes.name: Paddington and the Bad Swap
episodes.overview: Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan’s rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

episodes.name: Paddington Celebrates Mrs. Bird's Day
episodes.overview: It’s Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it – how will he show his appreciation?

episodes.name: Paddington the Table Tennis Champ
episodes.overview: Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team and the beat the table hogs so everyone can play!

episodes.name: Paddington Gets Fit
episodes.overview: It’s the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him!

episodes.name: Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair
episodes.overview: Jonathan, Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird’s much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

episodes.name: Paddington and the Big Decision
episodes.overview: On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan and Judy can’t agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote.

episodes.name: Paddington's Beach Stowaway
episodes.overview: The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair—why is that shell moving on its own?

episodes.name: Paddington and the Caterpillar
episodes.overview: Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad!

episodes.name: Paddington Plays the Floor Is Lava
episodes.overview: The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava, but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

episodes.name: Paddington and the Vegetable Thief
episodes.overview: Who’s trying to steal Mr. Curry’s prized Giant Pumpkin? PC Wells & Paddington are on the case.

episodes.name: Paddington Takes to the Ice
episodes.overview: There’s an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a past fall?

episodes.name: Paddington's Space Adventure
episodes.overview: Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world’s first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family!

episodes.name: Paddington's Blackberry Treasure
episodes.overview: Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden, but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

episodes.name: Paddington Opens the City Farm
episodes.overview: Paddington’s excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open—will they find them in time?

episodes.name: Paddington the Upcycler
episodes.overview: Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward?

episodes.name: Paddington's Lucky Day
episodes.overview: Paddington Jonathan & Judy are worried they’ve used up all of Lucky the dog’s luck—how will they tell Sofia?

episodes.name: Paddington the Pizza Chef
episodes.overview: Baaz’s niece Simi is visiting & he wants to create the perfect pizza to surprise her with, but it’s not easy with hungry animals around!

episodes.name: Paddington and the Tooth Fairy
episodes.overview: Judy loses a tooth, quite literally. Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade?

episodes.name: Paddington Goes to Work
episodes.overview: Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office, but learns computers can be tricky things.

episodes.name: Paddington Saves the Bees
episodes.overview: Paddington hurts his knee and goes to see Dr. Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps up and is mistaken for a doctor.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Heat Wave
episodes.overview: Paddington learns about bees and decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden; there's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens and Mateo has sold out of ice-creams.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Sleep Over
episodes.overview: Simi and Toq come to stay for the night.

episodes.name: Paddington Gets Locked Out on Christmas Day
Paddington Becomes a Talent Show Judge
Paddington Keeps Up with The Kamalis
Paddington's Pet Hotel
episodes.overview: Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when Lucky stays over.

episodes.name: Paddington Helps a Hedgehog
episodes.overview: The kids are playing in the garden and make a prickly discovery. Something is not right so Paddington asks Baaz to help.

episodes.name: Paddington the Best Bear
episodes.overview: Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. and Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing photos, so they decide to do it all again.

episodes.name: Paddington's Campfire Stories
episodes.overview: Whose story will earn them a camp fire story telling badge and will any of them be too scary.

episodes.name: Paddington's Goo Monster
episodes.overview: Paddington makes Goo, but can he keep his promise to not make a mess when things get out of control?

episodes.name: Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure
episodes.overview: Paddington and Simi go on a magical journey into the human body to see if an apple seed grows into a tree if you swallow one.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Lake Monster
episodes.overview: Mr. Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake, and Paddington sets out to help him prove it.

episodes.name: Paddington's Space Radio
episodes.overview: It's Father's Day, but how will Toq let her dad know she's thinking of him all the way up in Space? Maybe the Browns can help?

episodes.name: Paddington and the Three Musketeers
episodes.overview: It's World Book Day, and Paddington helps Mateo discover his favorite character to dress up as.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt
episodes.overview: Paddington, Simi, and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt on the island in the park, but dinosaurs don't exist anymore do they?

episodes.name: Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole
episodes.overview: When things go missing in Windsor Gardens, Jonathan believes a black hole is to blame, so Paddington goes on a space mission.

episodes.name: Paddington's Rainbow Race!
episodes.overview: Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow after they break Baaz's kaleidoscope.

episodes.name: Paddington Meets Paddingtron
episodes.overview: Paddington build a robot called Paddingtron that requires a real friend to work.

episodes.name: Paddington's First Diwali
episodes.overview: Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him, and Paddington is his helpful assistant, but will they both get to enjoy the fireworks finale?

episodes.name: Paddington and the Solar Eclipse
episodes.overview: Paddington has a race against time in order to enjoy his first ever solar eclipse.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor
episodes.overview: Paddington accepts an inventor's award for Simi when she's too shy to step up, but why does she then feel jealous and sad?

episodes.name: Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins
episodes.overview: The Browns are off to the beach for their holiday and meet Shantee the lighthouse keeper when they arrive.

episodes.name: Paddington's Life Guard Training
episodes.overview: Paddington, Jonathan, and Judy become trainee lifeguards and end up rescuing Mr Brown with Taylor the lifeguard's help.

episodes.name: Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery
episodes.overview: What's making the strange noises in the cave? Jonathan thinks it's a mermaid, but Paddington isn't so sure!

episodes.name: Paddington and the Fossil Hunt
episodes.overview: Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, but everyone else seems to be getting lucky except her. Can Paddington help?

episodes.name: Paddington vs. the Seagulls
episodes.overview: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips and will do anything to get them, but can he deliver lunch while it's still hot?

episodes.name: Paddington and the Light House
episodes.overview: The lighthouse light is broken and on a foggy night too. Can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

episodes.name: Paddington’s Pirate Treasure Hunt
episodes.overview: Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find Captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share?

episodes.name: Paddington’s Sandcastle Showstopper
episodes.overview: Everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition and enjoy a special ice cream prize, but teamwork is the key!

episodes.name: Paddington's Beach Clean Up
episodes.overview: The beach is a mess. Will all the litter be cleared in time for the beach party that everyone has been looking forward to?

episodes.name: Paddington's Holiday Farewell
episodes.overview: The summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends.

episodes.name: Paddington's Puffling Rescue
episodes.overview: Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings, who get lost around the campsite instead of taking their first flight.

episodes.name: Paddington goes under the Sea
episodes.overview: Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy ‐ but where is her necklace?

episodes.name: Paddington's Hero Squad
episodes.overview: A superfood cake creates some super heroes.

episodes.name: Paddington's Knightly Quest
episodes.overview: Paddington wants to become a Knight; but needs to complete heroic quests!

episodes.name: Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant
episodes.overview: Windsor Gardens has two new heroes!

episodes.name: Paddington and the Accidental Hero
episodes.overview: Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome.

episodes.name: Paddington's Race Against the Storm
episodes.overview: Judy finds her inner hero on a camping trip.

episodes.name: Paddington's Super Snail
episodes.overview: Paddington befriends a speedy snail with a heroic future ahead.

episodes.name: Paddington and Paddingtron's Heroic Day
episodes.overview: Paddington and Robot Paddingtron enjoy being heroes

episodes.name: Paddington's Heroic Non-Stop Adventure
episodes.overview: Paddington discovers how to be calm.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Unlikely Hero
episodes.overview: Paddington seeks the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens

episodes.name: Paddington Needs a Hero
episodes.overview: Paddington gets stuck in an igloo.

episodes.name: Paddington's Favourite Hero
episodes.overview: Paddington struggles to choose a hero for a special photo wall in the park - maybe he needs to look closer to home.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Skateboarder
episodes.overview: Paddington becomes a heroic skateboarder, thanks to Mateo and a special mask - but how magical is the mask?

episodes.name: Paddington and the Cursed Halloween Show Festival
episodes.overview: It's Halloween, but will a curse on the theatre stop the community putting on their special spooky play?

episodes.name: Paddington Saves the Mooncake
episodes.overview: Taylor the lifeguard arrives in Windsor Gardens, and just in time to save the Mooncake festival with Paddington!

episodes.name: Paddington’s Birthday Gift Hunt
episodes.overview: Taylor reveals it's his birthday, but how can his friends make it special when they had no idea?

episodes.name: Paddington’s Burn’s Night Haggis Hunt
episodes.overview: It's Burn's Night and Mrs. Bird teaches Paddington about a rare creature called a Wild Haggis, but will it visit them?

episodes.name: Paddington’s Earth Day Mission
episodes.overview: It's Earth Day and Paddington has the important job of planting a tree, but will he find the perfect spot before it's too late?

episodes.name: Paddington’s Special Spring Harvest Celebration
episodes.overview: Baaz holds a Spring Harvest Festival, and everyone enjoys bringing their own celebration along.

episodes.name: Paddington’s Special Visitor
episodes.overview: Who is Paddington's Special Visitor that Jonathan and Judy have helped come from afar?

episodes.name: Paddington Celebrates Hanukkah
episodes.overview: It's the last night of Hanukkah and Mr Gruber's Hanukkiah breaks before he can light the final candle, how can another be found in time?

episodes.name: Paddington’s Adventure Club Cracks the Case
episodes.overview: Paddington and his friends set out to help PC Wells solve the case of the missing Windsor, Ruby, Paddington and Aunt.

episodes.name: Lucy’s Special Recipe
episodes.overview: Thanks to Aunt Lucy's special recipe the Brown's set up a takeaway business from their home, but it's hard work!

episodes.name: Paddington’s Football Dilemma
episodes.overview: Paddington has to choose between England and Peru before their football cup match, but he loves both places equally!

episodes.name: Paddington Has to Say Goodbye
episodes.overview: The time has come for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still time for one last adventure - or is there?
